pkgmetadata.longdescription: # youtube_searchPython function for searching for youtube videos to avoid using their heavily rate-limited APITo avoid using the API, this uses the form on the youtube homepage and scrapes the resulting page.## Example UsageFor a basic search (and all of the current functionality), you can use the search tool as follows:```pip install youtube-search``````pythonfrom youtube_search import YoutubeSearchresults = YoutubeSearch('search terms', max_results=10).to_json()print(results)# returns a json string########################################results = YoutubeSearch('search terms', max_results=10).to_dict()print(results)# returns a dictionary```
